boardgame.name: Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons: The Legend of Drizzt Board Game
boardgame.description: A cooperative game of adventure for 1-5 players set in the world of Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Dragons._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It is named after the book series by the same name recounting the adventures of the dark elf Drizzt Do'Urden and his friends._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Designed for 1-5 players, this boardgame features multiple scenarios, challenging quests, and cooperative game play. Players explore the game world, which is built during the game by laying out tiles, using ready-made player characters and encountering enemies with corresponding miniatures. Encounters are generated by drawing cards and resolved using a D20 die. All players win together, depending on the scenario, by escaping, saving others or overcoming a threat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is a complete, very good copy of Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons: The Legend of Drizzt board game and is from my personal collection--I only got a chance to play this on a single occasion with another adult, so everything is in superb condition. Unfortunately my living/storage situation is about to change and so I just don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have room for it anymore... my loss is definitely your gain in this instance! For peace of mind, the game comes from a non-smoking, no pet home. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m asking $38 for it and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll take of the shipping (via USPS parcel post) anywhere within the continental U.S. Not only will you be getting a great deal on a great game, but you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be supporting a fellow BGG member in the process (and even making my wife happy that I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m thinning the herd!). Thanks so much for your interest and best wishes for the holidays!
